ack.title: Acknowledgment
ack.p: The authors thank the patients for participating in the studies; ParkWest thanks all members of the Norwegian ParkWest study group and other personnel involved in the study; NYPUM thanks the study nurse/coordinator Mona Edström and laboratory technician Jörgen Andersson for database management; and PINE thanks the research fellows (Kate Taylor, Robert Caslake, and David McGhee) and study nurses (Clare Harris, Joanna Gordon, Anne Hayman, and Hazel Forbes) who assessed participants, the secretaries (Susan Kilpatrick and Pam Rebecca), the data management team (Katie Wilde and David Ritchie), and the clinicians who referred patients to the PINE study.
